items.desc: The DeFi Skeptic team is a strong believer in collaboration over competition. Working with like minded platforms/projects and sharing each others resources is a key component of DeFi Skeptic and a valued aspect of our platform.

partners.title: GemPad
partners.desc1: GemPad is a frontline protocol for users and project-owners designed to help to launch their projects and tokens in the easiest way possible. Their tiered listing insures a high level of security for pre-launch investors.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic will provide project vetting, audits and various other services to GemPad.
partners.desc3: By leveraging DeFi Skeptics intensive vetting process, GemPad ensures projects listing on their launchpad maintain a high level of transparency and information accuracy.

partners.title: Apollo Ventures
partners.desc1: Apollo Ventures is a complete ecosystem to help crypto projects get launched and find vetted services to help promote their project consisting of a marketplace, ads platform and launchpad. Additionally, Apollo Ventures has a loss protection plan which covers anywhere from 25% to 100% of a presale contributors funds incase of exploit or vulnerability.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic will provide project vetting, audits and various other services to Apollo Ventures.
partners.desc3: By leveraging DeFi Skeptics intensive vetting process, Apollo Venture ensures projects listing on their launchpad maintain a high level of transparency and information accuracy.

partners.title: Son Of Doge
partners.desc1: Son Of Doge is a decentralized and borderless ecosystem with a multi-chain launchpad focused on bridging meme and utility.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic will provide project vetting, audits and various other services to Son Of Doge.
partners.desc3: By leveraging DeFi Skeptics intensive vetting process, Son Of Doge ensures projects listing on their launchpad maintain a high level of transparency and information accuracy.

partners.title: CroGram
partners.desc1: CroGram is a brand new mobile app created for devs and investors in the crypto community. Join or create groups, messaging, voice chat, trending, and much more. Think Telegram and Discord blended to create the perfect platform for cryptocurrency investors.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic will provide project vetting which will be used to give projects a "Trusted" badge within the app. DeFi Skeptic will also be a preferred developer service provider within the VIP section!
partners.desc3: By leveraging DeFi Skeptics intensive vetting process, CroGram ensures projects have a way of showing the userbase trhey are trusted and transparent.

partners.title: Dappd
partners.desc1: Dappd is a software development company specializing in DeFi/Blockchain Technology. Their services include custom smart contract creation, presales, web3 bots, dApps, websites, auditing, and blockchain consulting/development.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic and Dappd are working in a cross-service partnership to leverage each others expertise.
partners.desc3: This partnership adds a valuable resource to the DeFi Skeptic ecosystem and supports our goal of legitimizing the space through ethical coding practices.

partners.title: SEEK
partners.desc1: SEEK is a platform focused on DeFi security and education. They offer an industry leading identification verification service (KYC) and harbor a vast community of safe, vetted and established projects under their umbrella. Their goal is to make DeFi a safer place for the investor.
partners.desc3: This partnership will allow SEEK and DeFi Skeptic to leverage key services from each other while supporting our collective goal of making DeFi better!

partners.title: StaySAFU
partners.desc1: StaySAFU is a Binance Smart Chain focused security platform which provides on demand scanning of smart contracts in addition to other services focused on making DeFi safer for the user.
partners.desc3: As a partner, DeFi Skeptic is granted access to the StaySAFU API which is a leading screening tool. This will be fused into the vetted project database and provide key details to project profiles. Additionally, StaySAFU will be leveraging some of DeFi Skeptics services, making this partnership a great strategic move for both sides!

partners.title: FloozTrade
partners.desc1: Flooz Trade takes pride in humanizing crypto by bridging the gap between FIAT and DeFi by allowing seamless FIAT onboarding making getting into a specific DeFi project incredibly easy.
partners.desc3: As a partner, DeFi Skeptic will provide Flooz Trade’s FIAT onboarding as a service to developers so they can get immediate FIAT to Token conversion for their project right from day one. The supports DeFi Skeptics goal of bettering DeFi by providing developers the tools they need for a successful project.

partners.title: Mobula
partners.desc1: Mobula is a decentralized data aggregator. They believe everyone should be able to query relaible data about DeFi assets and not rely on the approval of centralized listing sites.
partners.desc2: DeFi Skeptic will be integrating data from Mobula in our vetted project database.
partners.desc3: This supports DeFi Skeptics goal of bettering DeFi by providing DeFi users and developers data without the centralization of specific platform controlling who gets listed and who doesnt based on how much they are willing to spend.

affiliates.title: AutoCrypto
affiliates.desc1: AutoCrypto is an automated broker app managed by an Artificial Intelligence that combines mathematical extrapolation polynomials alongside a pre-trained time-series prediction neuronal network to predict very precisely the evolution of the top 200 cryptocurrencies and investing automatically for you. AutoCrypto’s mission is to provide people from all income ranges a way to achieve financial independence.
affiliates.desc2: DeFi Skeptic provides AutoCrypto up-to-date reports on vetted projects to support their mission.
affiliates.desc3: This is done automatically through their social platforms anytime a report is finalized.

promoters.title: Legit Crypto Lounge
promoters.desc1: One major issue in the DeFi space is how projects are promoted. A very effective way of reaching an audience is by directly speaking to them. However, many of these platforms conduct in unethical practices using “paid” bots to make their customer feel like they are getting more than they really are.
promoters.desc2: DeFi Skeptic has made an effort to source legitimate promotional platforms who do not conduct in these practices such as

texts.content:
DeFi Skeptic serves DeFi in various ways. One way is by conducting in-depth video interviews with project developers. During this session, the Defi Skeptic team will scrutinize, analyze, and independently review every aspect of the project following the vetting process. Providing this level of detail on DeFi projects can help reduce fraud while increasing security and peace of mind for those looking to invest their hard-earned money.

If you are a project team member and would like to apply to have the project vetted by DeFi Skeptic, you can do so on the Get Vetted page.

DeFi projects that have passed the vetting process are listed in the DeFi Skeptic Vetted Projects page.
